name: Deer Hunting and Dino Hunter
description:
""Deer Hunting and Dino Hunter" is free to play and Download.

Hunting wild jungle animals is fun when one is a professional hunter as an amateur will endanger his life in trying to kill furious beasts.
Be the fearless and furious Dino hunter and kill some most furious, deadly and dangerous dinosaurs in the jungle.
In this epic game the dinosaurs are not extinct. These dinosaurs are as real. Become a ultimate dinosaur hunter, catch your prey!
Grab your armory and gear up to survive the deadly dinosaur attack.
You are alone in the jungle with only one weapon. Survive through this apoclypse with your ultrs hunting skills.
With access to powerful guns you will rely on your marksman skills to kill and trap animals including deer, wolf, bear, fox, zombie, triceraptor, raptor, etc

Game Features:

- Immersive hunting missions to complete
- Realistic 3D graphics and awesome sound effects
- Dozens of real world weapons and upgrades
- An ultimate hunting action.
- Game play is simple yet entertaining.
